folder.name: Create metadata objects in Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools

content.query:
/*
Operationalize data transformation with Azure Synapse serverless 
    SQL pools using stored procedures
*/

-- this sample references external data source and external file format defined in previous section
CREATE PROCEDURE usp_calculate_population_by_year_state
AS
BEGIN
	CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE population_by_year_state
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'population_by_year_state/',
		DATA_SOURCE = destination_ds,  
		FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
	)  
	AS
	SELECT decennialTime, stateName, SUM(population) AS population
	FROM
		OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/censusdatacontainer/release/us_population_county/year=*/*.parquet',
		FORMAT='PARQUET') AS [r]
	GROUP BY decennialTime, stateName
END
GO
